title: Politics of Modern India
description: The course gives an overview of Indian politics since 1947. It addresses the following: (1) To what extent is India a full-fledged democracy in which all citizens enjoy political equality? (2) Why has political violence occurred in some parts of India, and at certain times, but not others? (3) How well have the country’s institutions fared in alleviating poverty? Prerequisites: upper-division standing.
